title: Building Microservices Containers Node JS

title: Batching Client GraphQL Queries
description: Modern apps are chatty—they require a lot of data, and thus make a lot of requests to underlying services to fulfill those needs.

title: React Custom Hook: useSubmit
description: A custom hook for submit events which you can gather loading and error states via hook, just like GraphQL in ApolloClient
